thread.title: Freida seals it with a kiss
thread.title_full: Freida seals it with a kiss - Bangalore Mirror

author: Sanyukta Iyer
title: Freida seals it with a kiss
text:
The actress was spotted enjoying a date with American polo player Ronnie Bacardi
There's a new celebrity couple strolling down the streets of Beverly Hills. Freida Pinto, who broke up with her Slumdog Millionaire co-star Dev Patel last year, was recently spotted indulging in some PDA with her special "friend,'' American polo player Ronnie Bacardi, in Los Angeles.
The Academy Award-winning actress was pictured kissing the player at Brazilian steakhouse Fogo de Chao, and the couple seemed completely in love as they walked hand-in-hand. They were also spotted making their way to a popular ice-cream parlour.
"We're just friends," Freida claimed while speaking to the media back in April, and maintained a similar stance when Mirror contacted her yesterday. "There is nothing to comment on, really," she said. The duo also went on a romantic getaway to vancouver on October 18, where they ushered in Freida's birthday. Barcardi had shared a snap of the actress from their trip, which was captioned: "Morning meets birthday girl...".
Freida has split from ex-beau Dev after a six-year romance and the duo maintain that they are on cordial terms. "We are incredibly close," Dev told Mirror (December 14), while Freida had stated, matter-of-factly (Mirror, September 5), "Dev and I are best friends. That's never going to change."
